answers.author: Israel Murguia
answers.text:
Roger,
The following link is for the state of California. You can view wage information within this geographical area and compare cities/towns within counties. I hope this helps. 
http://lgcr.sco.ca.gov/EntityList.aspx?entity=County&load=ByDefault


Roger,

http://lgcr.sco.ca.gov/EntityList.aspx?entity=County&load=ByDefault

author: Roger Gorius
text:
I am researching possible jobs in various parts of the country. I would like to know if I can get information on wages of managers in comparable municipalities in the same geographical area for comparison in how sound an offer is from the town. Thank you.
Sincerely 
Roger Gorius
title: Wage Coomparison in Job Search
